name: Low Poly Puzzle: Art Coloring
description:
Love coloring? Wild about puzzles? Our newly arrived poly art game is what you need!

Get inspired by colorful polygonal pictures. Dive into amazing brain training game. Pick different pieces of a scrambled puzzle and compose them into beautiful images.

Poly Art Puzzle is a highly addictive and unique game that blends positive features of jigsaw puzzles and coloring books beloved by everyone!

KEY FEATURES:
- New puzzles added regularly
- Beautiful color pages created by professional artists
- Great array of categories for everyone: people, fashion, food, animals, flowers, birds and others
- Night mode coloring to protect your eyes while playing
- Family-friendly content: anti stress pictures suit both kids and adults

Keep up with the latest rage with Poly Art Puzzle! Get it now and share your art with everyone!

The app contains the following subscription options:
- Weekly for $6.99 with a 3-day free trial period
- Monthly for $19.99
- Yearly for $69.99
- Free trial subscription is automatically renewed unless cancelled 24 hours before the renewal
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase
